verbs.description: italian chicken roll - ups because [ARG0: i] [V: have] [ARG1: a busy schedule] i like to keep a batch of these tender chicken rolls in the freezer coated with golden crumbs they seem fancy enough for company i 've substituted mozzarella cheese for the provolone and pastrami for the ham with equally delicious results —barbara wobser sandusky ohio
